No. 358,

Misc.

Riera v. Fay, Warden. Richard J. Medalie for petitioner. Louis J. Lejkowitz, Attorney General of New York, Samuel A. Hirshowitz, First Assistant Attorney General, and Lillian Z. Cohen, Deputy Assistant Attorney General, for respondent.

C. A. 2d Cir. Certiorari denied.
